about_the_game:
Season Pass features 12 upcoming DLC, available for a lower price than when purchased separately. The DLC will become available in stages starting from March 2021.

● Season Pass bonus: “Mysterious Book Alchemist” costume for Ryza, based on Sophie from “Atelier Sophie: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Book.”

[Content included in the Season Pass]
① Ryza's Swimsuit "Tropical Summer"
② Lent's Swimsuit "Beach Flag King"
③ Tao's Swimsuit "School Trip"
④ Klaudia's Swimsuit "Black Monokini"
⑤ Patricia's Swimsuit "White Beach Corset"
⑥ Clifford's Swimsuit "Ocean Treasure"
⑦ Serri's Swimsuit "Bitter Chocolate"
⑧ Recipe Expansion Pack "The Art of Synthesis"
⑨ Recipe Expansion Pack "The Art of Battle"
⑩ Additional Area "Keldorah Castle"
⑪ High-difficulty Area "Flame Sun Island"
⑫ Gust Extra BGM Pack

Note:
- ① - ⑦ individual costumes for characters.
- ⑧ new material and Essence recipes.
- ⑨ new recipes for battle items, armor, accessories, and 7 weapons for party characters.
- ⑩ new set of ruins to explore (features non-voiced event scenes).
- ⑪ new high-difficulty set of ruins to explore (features non-voiced event scenes).
- ⑫ additional BGM tracks from Gust titles (features tracks from “Atelier Ryza”, “BLUE REFLECTION” and others).

- ① - ⑧⑩⑫ are expected to be released before the end of April 2021; ⑨⑪ are expected to be released before the end of May 2021.
- All costumes, swimsuits can be changed in the “Changing Room” accessible through the desk in the Atelier. Characters need to join the party before their costumes can be changed.
- Items listed in ⑧ - ⑪ will either become available at a certain point of the main story or will require end game save data.
- ⑫ BGM can be changed at the desk in the Atelier.

- Contents of the Season Pass, release dates, and the release order are subject to change without prior notification.
- And all 12 items featured in the Season Pass can be purchased separately upon release.
- Please beware that “Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy Ultimate Edition” set that features this content is also available for purchase.
